data.title: Toki wa Meguru: Tokyo Station
data.title_japanese: 時季（とき）は巡る～TOKYO STATION～
data.synopsis: Misaki, a 25-year-old woman who is soon to be married, finds an old photo taken at Tokyo Station and an old, broken pocket watch from her late father. Her father worked at Tokyo Station during his life and was a very strict man in her memory, but she saw his smile from the old photo that she's never seen before. Misaki, in attempt to have the old pocket watch repaired, discovers that a watch store existed in Tokyo Station in the past.
data.background: Toki wa Meguru was created in celebration of the 100th anniversary of Tokyo Station. The goal of the short anime is to show the history of the station through animation and music.

titles.title: LOVE STAGE!! チョットジャナクッテ

data.title: Love Stage!!: Chotto ja Nakutte
data.title_japanese: LOVE STAGE!! チョットジャナクッテ
data.synopsis:
Bundled with volume four of the manga series Love Stage!! written by Eiki Eiki. 

This OVA takes place right after the final episode of Love Stage!! the anime series, which is based on the manga volumes 1-3.

titles.title: いただきっ! セーエキ♥

data.title: Itadaki! Seieki♥ Special
data.title_japanese: いただきっ! セーエキ♥
data.synopsis:
Having found a beautiful partner that is well-versed in sexual matters, Kanzaki certainly counts himself lucky. However, reality soon catches up with him, and he wonders why someone as attractive as Mari Setagaya wants to hang out with his mundane self.
 
When Kanzaki reveals his doubts to his girlfriend, Mari worries that he might be getting bored of her. She decides to use her innate charm as a half-succubus and prove to Kanzaki that she has eyes only for him. 

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Itadaki! Seieki♥ Special was included with the Itadaki! Seieki♥ DVD, released by Kitty Media on October 31, 2017.

data.title_japanese: DECORATOR

titles.title: School of Monsters! Wolf Girl Won't Give Up
がくモン!〜オオカミ少女はくじけない〜

data.title: Gakumon!: Ookami Shoujo wa Kujikenai
data.title_japanese: がくモン!〜オオカミ少女はくじけない〜
title_synonyms: School of Monsters! Wolf Girl Won't Give Up
data.synopsis:
”Wereman" Shushu's life is turned upside down when her father tells her that despite what she was told her entire life, she is in fact a female, and cannot become a wereman. To be certified as a wereman so she can become a public servant and let her father retire, she enrolls in Monster Academy. There, she meets Juzu, the son of the monster king who founded the school. Although he is feared by everyone due to his status, when her secret is exposed to the monster prince, she finds out that Juzu is in fact stupid, but is kind and just wanted a friend. With all the eyes of the students on Shushu and Juzu, the inconspicuous life Shushu so direly desired goes down the drain.

Note: The third episode will begin streaming on December 4, 2014 to celebrate the release of the manga's first compiled book volume, which will ship in Japan the same day.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: Choubakuretsu Ijigen Menko Battle: Gigant Shooter Tsukasa
超爆裂異次元メンコバトル ギガントシューター つかさ

data.title: Choubakuretsu Ijigen Menko Battle: Gigant Shooter Tsukasa
data.title_japanese: 超爆裂異次元メンコバトル ギガントシューター つかさ
data.synopsis:
The anime follows Tsukasa, whose dream is to become the best at Gigant Shooter (battles in a game similar to pog) in the world. The menko card his father left for him called King Menger is his partner. Tsukasa's fellow gamers are the cute but tsundere Koide Miruko, the spectacled bully Numata Manabu, and the realist and sharp-tongued Doumoto Ataru.

(Source: ANN)

data.title: Otsuki-sama to Oujo
data.title_japanese: お月さまと王女
data.synopsis: Sachiko is unhappy and doesn't have a lot of energy. One day, a white rabbit appears and takes her to the "Land of the Moon." There, she meets her "true self," a happy and healthy girl, and Sachiko realizes she can be just like her.

data.title: Calligraffiti
data.title_japanese: カリグラフィティー
data.synopsis: Short animation directed by an illustrator and picture book writer Furukawa Taku.

data.title: Enbi
data.title_japanese: 艶美
data.synopsis:
It's time for the local summer festival and Kentarou is accompanying Shizue, who has come to visit after being away for a few years. During the festival Kentarou leaves Shizue alone for a bit, and when he finds her again he sees a shocking scene...

Later, Shizue goes to a local photo studio to pick up some photos from the summer festival, and decides to do a bit of modeling while there. Before long Kentarou also joins...

(Source: AniDB)

data.title: Aterui
data.title_japanese: アテルイ
data.synopsis: A pseudo-historical movie that follows a modern day elementary schooler as he's tossed back into time to observe Aterui--a real leader of the Emishi who fought against the Imperial Yamato Court.

titles.title: 二死満塁[ツーダンフルベース]

data.title: Two Down Full Base
data.title_japanese: 二死満塁[ツーダンフルベース]
data.synopsis:
Based on the children's book by Sunada Hiroshi.

Musuke "Shorty" Sato is a shortstop for the local junior baseball team, the Eggs, who is asked by his mother to look after some money for her. He foolishly lends it to Tower and Dump, the school bad-boys, and must enlist the help of the pitcher's pretty little sister.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

data.title: Gudetama
data.title_japanese: ぐでたま
data.synopsis:
Gudetama, an egg that is dead to the world and completely lacks motivation. No matter what cooking method you use, Gudetama remains unmoved.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: Choboraunyopomi Gekijou Dai Ni Maku Ai Mai Mii: Mousou Catastrophe
ちょぼらうにょぽみ劇場第二幕 あいまいみー ~妄想カタストロフ~

data.title: Choboraunyopomi Gekijou Dai Ni Maku Ai Mai Mii: Mousou Catastrophe
data.title_japanese: ちょぼらうにょぽみ劇場第二幕 あいまいみー ~妄想カタストロフ~
data.synopsis: Second season of Ai Mai Mii.

data.title: Neko no Dayan
data.title_japanese: 猫のダヤン
data.synopsis: Dayan the cat came to Wachi Field from the Earth through Snow magic.  Wachi Field was originally part of the Earth, but separated by Snow God because of the War between Gods and Titans, which destroyed the land.  After the war, the Earth's time flow faster than Wachi Field, which the life is slow with animals and fairies and full of mischief.

data.title: Kagirinaki Rakuen
data.title_japanese: 限りなき楽園
data.synopsis: A young man is beaten down by both bullies and an oppressive, militaristic school system. At first he retreats into daydreams and fantasies in order to cope but eventually decides to rebel.
data.background: An 8mm short film Hiroshi Harada made while he was in high school. It was considered lost media for a long time, but was released in its entirety in 2023.

titles.title: 一休さん 大暴れやんちゃ姫

data.title: Ikkyuu-san: Ooabare Yancha-hime
data.title_japanese: 一休さん 大暴れやんちゃ姫
data.synopsis:
The rampant adventures of the mischievous Tsuyu take the lead here: "Ikkyuu-dono! Let's Play!!"

(Source: AniDB)

data.title: 12-sai.
data.synopsis:
The story begins with Hanabi, a sixth-grade girl who is neither an adult nor a child. She deals with issues such as accidentally witnessing her homeroom teacher kissing, and worrying about experiencing physiological changes before her friends. The manga depicts a 12-year-old girl's innocent worries and first love.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Akage no Anne
World Masterpiece Theater Complete Edition: Anne of Green Gables
世界名作劇場・完結版 赤毛のアン

data.title: Akage no Anne Specials
data.title_japanese: 世界名作劇場・完結版 赤毛のアン
title_synonyms: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Akage no Anne
World Masterpiece Theater Complete Edition: Anne of Green Gables
data.synopsis:
A summary of the Akage no Anne full series aired as a TV specials.

Anne is an orphan full of imagination. When she arrives at her new home she learns that sometimes you have to be a sensible person too; at the same time her unique character changes, or at least attracts, the people around her. The story covers Anne's growth from about eleven to seventeen years old as she makes friends, goes to school and studies. At a difficult point in her life, Anne will have to make a hard choice and perhaps find a new dream.

(Source: AniDB)
